author: Raja Abdulrahim
title: Syrian Regime Gains Ground in Opposition Enclave
text:
The Syrian regime has seized more than half of a rebel enclave outside Damascus that has been under a tightening military and economic siege, part of a final onslaught on one of the last areas held by forces that have fought for seven years to topple President Bashar al-Assad.

The latest advances have split Eastern Ghouta and made its recapture possibly imminent. Taking Ghouta would enable the regime to further consolidate control around the capital and move toward its goal of ending the conflict through force rather than...
